person.description: When Alba is not hard at work studying Transportation Engineering, she loves skiing on Oare mountain.
Evalyn studied Environmental Science at McGill University in Montreal. She likes snowboarding, interior canoeing, and scuba diving.
Ahmed is passionate about football and learning new languages. He believes in random acts of kindness, and has a special interest in accents and dialects.
Hailing from Sweden, Leo loves philosophizing by the (relatively) cold Scandinavian seaside. He is also a budding poker shark.
After his first career as a pro footballer in Egypt, Mostafa turned his sights on a career with a lower probability of injury: Geoinformatics. He also loves cooking for friends and travelling.
